185906456.review: No initeu só entrava pra ver algumas coisas e se eu conseguiria aumentar de nível, mas aí eu vi uma coisa, algum bem interessante que é a redefinição, eu comecei de 5x em em 5x, depois 10x em 10x, agora 20x em 20x, isso acho que faz um mês que jogo e meu jogo faz em alguns minutos bilhões só com empregos pequenos, hoje em 1 dia eu chego no nível amor com pelo menos 2 ou três garotas e em 2 dias 5 garotas, depois de descobri essa coisa e as mensagens começarem a ficar disponíveis, eu simplesmente comecei a jogar durante vários dias, é muito por pelo menos 30 min a 1h, porque como eu leio rápido tudo termina mais rápido(e ele ataca novamente, capitão óbvio está em ação), o jogo tem as garotas das quais vocês pode conversar e também adiantar os diálogos, não faço isso, mas vai de você, bem o jogo é interessante, o jogo tem um bom senso de humor e isso o deixa com um 7/10. Em certo ponto o jogo deixa de ser clicker.

185824888.review:
Progress is painfully slow, to the point where I had to run a prompt to switch my date back and forth 7 days ahead, and the "reset boost" feature speeds up time but forcing you to reset your progress, while keeping the "time blocks" you receive by in-game achievements. But I mean, it's another free game with achievements. The interactions are cute, dialogue is interesting, though it is just lewd overall ;w; 
[I was completely done with the game when I realized it had the freaking "hentai" tag, so Steam started recommending that crap to me-]. 
But there's actually interesting lore. That's the only thing that kept me around. I started with the mobile version, like, what, 3 years ago? Quit after about a day since no autoclicker. 

Long story short, if you're in it for the "awooga" content, be my guest, but also be prepared for a long, long road of progress. [One of the achievements literally requires you to play for a year] Good story though. 6/10 [Also Peanut is "Baenut", all naughty stuff aside]

185751108.review:
Hab mich durchgeschummelt (siehe Tipp). Der reine Klicker hat wenig zu zeigen, wegen Standord Deutschland werde ich mir den DLC nie holen können daher werde ich nie wissen wie es mit ist. Aber im Basisspiel klickt ihr euch nur durch. Schätze mal das war zu erwarten.

Tipp: 
1. Internet abtrennen
2. Datum verstellen
3. Spiel öffnen
4. Warten auf das Speicher Symbol
5. Spiel schließen
5. Schritt 2-5 beliebig oft wiederholen
6. Datum wieder auf automatisch aktualisieren und das Spiel ein letztes mal öffnen und schließen. Sonst bekommt ihr möglicherweise keine Belohnung für eure nächste Afk Zeit.
Dies funktioniert übrigens bei allen offline Klickern und sogar einigen Handyspielen. Viel Spaß.
So könnt ihr Wochen nach vorne springen und jeweils für 7 Tage Belohnungen sammeln.

Übrigens lässt sich der Basisinhalt und die Zusatzinhalte nicht ohne den Zeitraffer im Shop abschließen. Ihr seid also mehr oder weniger gezwungen alle freien Diamanten dort zu investieren oder ihr kommt irgendwann nicht mehr weiter. Die Beschleunigung durch einen Soft Reset hat ein hartes Limit. 2x aus dem Shop wäre schon doppelt so schnell ... alles ...

185534099.review:
There comes a time in every man's life when he needs to look in the mirror and ask himself how exactly he got to that place.
You have to truly reflect on the decisions you have made along the path that led you to the place of your final reckoning.

It's still not clear, even to me, why I bought this game.
There's nothing wrong with it, with those nudity scenes it's perfectly stellar. But when you look at it as a choice, you realize how damaged I and the rest of humanity are.

What prompted me to buy a game like this? What part of my soul felt so empty that I thought a virtual girl could fill it?
When I look into the infinite depths of my own loneliness, I see a pool of reflection. My face is not there, there is no face. There are only tears in that puddle, tears of shame, loss and confusion.

If it were up to me again, I know I would buy it in a heartbeat, I know I would load it up and skip the countless window prompts so I could get a single bite of the pornographic images that are available online.
However, despite the abundance of naked virtual women waiting in the digital sphere, I chose to purchase this game and dedicate hours of my life to it. That time will never return to me, it is lost just like my soul and like time I fear never to find it again.

There is something broken inside me, something that desires sensations beyond my reach, something that moans every night knowing that there is no real princess, it is simply an illusion.
In my quest to find meaning in this long life, I searched for the colorful lights and sounds of a world that only exists in a pop-up window on my computer.

I'm not sure what the moral of this review is, I'm not sure of my place within the universe, all I know is that no amount of virtual girls can cure the big rot that has plagued me
I really need money for treatment...

185199409.review: Crush Crush is a quirky and entertaining idle dating sim that mixes humor with charm. you start by meeting unique characters, each with their own personality, and work to win their affection through time, effort, and upgrades. the art style is colorful and appealing, and the dialogue is full of playful jokes. it’s a game that doesn’t take itself too seriously, making it perfect for casual fun. if you enjoy idle games with a lighthearted twist, give it a try :))

185084805.review: This game will make you moist. It will curdle your yurdles and leave you in despair.  Buy Catara, and download an auto clicker as your girls tell you to. Girls that give you jobs are worth it too. Phone flings are ridiculously long and make it dull. Once your stats are maxed out you will slowly gain 0.1 quadrillion$ and this is where it becomes unbalanced going forward. if you don't spend diamonds once you're maxed out you'll have to wait hours when it took less than 5 minutes to reach this point after a soft reset, using speed dating and turning off pop-up images and intros. then once you have enough to buy enough magic slippers - 160 quadrillion each, the end of the game takes less than 2 minutes to finish if you have all your stats maxed out.

185078097.review: I'm really disappointed in this game. Another glorified clicker / idler, hardly a dating simulator. You have to first of all keep resetting it. Which sucks all the joy out of the game. It takes forever earning diamonds. The game is 90% made from male point of view, and a lot of the dialogue makes you feel it's not meant for you as a woman. Progress takes forever, I'm talking years(!!!). Only a weeks worth of earnings is saved if not returning to the game. This is in every way better than Blush Blush, but yet 100% not worth your time. My advice is don't even start. Such a waste of time. As you can see, I already wasted way too much time on it -_- It was not worth it.

184992783.review:
建立两个文件，第一个起的名字记住，比如111.bat,里面的内容是
date 2050-1-1
date xxxx-x-x（当天，免得之后再同步时间）
另外一个文件随便起名字，也是.bat文件，里面这么写

for /l %%a in (1,1,1000) do (
111.bat
)

111.bat是刚才的文件
这样就是自动修改1000回时间
----------------------------------------------------------
很麻烦的游戏，如果你要玩的话，需要一个简单的鼠标连点器，以及自己写一个自动多次更改时间的脚本。

里面有内购，但是基本没什么用处
考虑到是个免费游戏，还是给个好评吧
5/10

因爲不想挂機所以修煉了時空之門，在不斷往返跳躍的時候，卻被新角色攔截住了。時空之門竟然不起作用了。我内心是很崩潰的。特別是看到要月下約會一百次的時候，我内心更是崩潰。

新出的倆角色“KARMA”和“SUTRA”好感度竟然是需要200+的Reset Boost。我這是要穿越到數萬年后才能摸到她倆的小手吧。

總之，這真是一個好游戲，標準的資本主義式戀愛。[spoiler] 沒錢還想泡妞嗎？[/spoiler]

184653266.review:
因爲不想挂機所以修煉了時空之門，在不斷往返跳躍的時候，卻被新角色攔截住了。時空之門竟然不起作用了。我内心是很崩潰的。特別是看到要月下約會一百次的時候，我内心更是崩潰。

新出的倆角色“KARMA”和“SUTRA”好感度竟然是需要200+的Reset Boost。我這是要穿越到數萬年后才能摸到她倆的小手吧。

總之，這真是一個好游戲，標準的資本主義式戀愛。[spoiler] 沒錢還想泡妞嗎？[/spoiler]

184652204.review:
Crush Crush é uma combinação de simulação de namoro e mecânicas de clicker, existem várias personagens que você pode tentar conquistar, cada uma com sua própria personalidade, interesses, aparência e histórias pessoais. 

Sinceramente minha motivação para baixar o jogo foi unicamente por conta das conquistas bonitinhas hehe ~ ♡ caso você também pretende apenas completar as conquistas rapidamente, basta você fazer duas coisas: baixar um auto clicker e mudar a data do seu computador.

184650878.review:
这款游戏在点击和放置中,更注重的后者而不是前者的点击.
所以这款游戏是闲暇之余玩玩的,而不是每天重复无聊的按来按去.

184650788.review:
一周目下来我的鼠标和手都要废了/(ㄒoㄒ)/~~现在貌似7周目了最后2个新角色都还没攻略成功，攻略所需的Reset Boost每周目会积累下来。
给萌新们的建议：
系统给的钻不要乱花！！！！把钻存起来买加速减CD，游戏时间会减少很多。
合理使用时空之门（单次穿越的时间不要超过30年！！！！否则游戏会承受不住时空穿梭的洪荒之力崩溃）

184650772.review:

184649128.review: 玩了15分钟解锁了0个成就，成就党不用玩了。

184647951.review:
建立两个文件，第一个起的名字记住，比如111.bat,里面的内容是
date 2050-1-1
date xxxx-x-x（当天，免得之后再同步时间）
另外一个文件随便起名字，也是.bat文件，里面这么写

for /l %%a in (1,1,1000) do (
111.bat
)

111.bat是刚才的文件
这样就是自动修改1000回时间
----------------------------------------------------------
很麻烦的游戏，如果你要玩的话，需要一个简单的鼠标连点器，以及自己写一个自动多次更改时间的脚本。

里面有内购，但是基本没什么用处
考虑到是个免费游戏，还是给个好评吧
5/10

184187164.review:
興味本位で始めてみて、思ったのは、音声は消した方が良い。
日本と、海外の、エロに対しての違いみたいなものを、実感できるかと。
あと、ヌードってタグ付いてるけど、日本の感覚で見たら、あのタグは付けないだろうなと・・・
日本でいうところの、課金ゲーなので、やるやらないは、お好きにしたらいいと思う。
ただなぁ、これなら、まだ、DMMのR18版のほうに課金した方が良いかなとは思う

183884140.review:
I played this way back when it was on a browser. I ended up using Cheatengine. Now I am playing it again just for the sake of nostalgia and cause it was genuinely fun.

Now I paid money. Honestly looking back on it, it feels a little scummy that I used Cheatengine on it. It felt justified but with what the devs have created here and with how much content that they actually give players? Even free content? Like you can straight up just play and pay nothing and still get everything via dailies or buy it outright.

Its the Azur Lane approach. And I cannot think of a single reason as to why these devs should not be supported for what they do. So I suppose take the money I spent as a "Sorry" for cheating way back when, devs. Glad you guys made it further than the browser c:
